decision_conditions:
The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.

Prior to construction a scheme for the provision and implementation of flood resilient and resistant construction details and measures for the lightwell against surface flood risk shall be submitted and agreed, in writing, with the LPA in consultation with the LLFA.  Mitigation measures may including providing suitable drainage, threshold levels and sump and pump where required in the lightwell. REASON: In the interest of ensuring the appropriate flood resilient and resistant measures are implemented for the proposed works.

<p dir="ltr" style="margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.2; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">Prior to the commencement of the relevant part of works, details of the</span><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;"> waste and recyclables storage (including materials, plans and elevations), shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority.&nbsp;</span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-size: 11pt; white-space-collapse: preserve;">The bin store shall only be implemented in accordance with the approved details.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.2; text-align: justify;"><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-size: 11pt; white-space-collapse: preserve;">REASON: To ensure the bin store integrates with the surrounding streetscene and host building.</span><br></p>

<p>All metalwork used to the railings and steps within the front lightwell hereby approved shall be painted black.&nbsp;</p><p>REASON: To ensure the development integrates with the surrounding streetscene and host building.&nbsp;</p>

<p>All new materials used in respect of all the works hereby approved (and any other incidental works to be carried out in this connection) shall match the existing building in respect of materials used, detailed execution and finished appearance unless otherwise shown on the hereby approved plans.&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>REASON: To ensure the development integrates with the surrounding streetscene and host building.&nbsp;</p>
description: Excavation to create front lightwell with steps and balustrade; addition of waste storage/ recycling bins and two bicycle parking.
